subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored only 8 points in the Nuggets’ loss to the Hornets, putting a sour finish on a day filled with speculation that Anthony was close to heading to the Nets.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored only 8 points in the Nuggets’ loss to the Hornets, putting a sour finish on a day filled with speculation that Anthony was close to heading to the Nets.
